Uses of Class
model.Wire

Packages that use Wire
controller Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. 
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
model Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation. 
 

Uses of Wire in controller
 

Methods in controller with parameters of type Wire
 void Controller.addWire(Wire wire)
          Creates a new AddWire command object and executes it.
 

Constructors in controller with parameters of type Wire
AddWire(Gui gui, Model model, Wire wire)
          Constructs a new AddWire command.
 

Uses of Wire in gui
 

Methods in gui that return Wire
 Wire WireImage.getWire()
          Returns the corresponding logical Wire object.
 

Methods in gui with parameters of type Wire
 void WireImage.setWire(Wire wire)
          Sets the corresponding wire object in the model.
 

Uses of Wire in model
 

Methods in model that return Wire
 Wire Model.getWire(int id)
          Returns a Wire object by id number.
 Wire WireFactory.buildWire(LogicComponent source, int sourcePin, LogicComponent sink, int sinkPin)
          Creates and returns a wire with the given parameters.
 

Methods in model with parameters of type Wire
 void Model.addWire(int id, Wire w)
          Adds a Wire object to the model, given an existing unique id number.
 void Model.connectComponents(Wire wire)
          Makes a visual connection between two components using a Wire object.
 void Model.disconnectComponents(Wire wire)
          Disconnects a visual connection between two components.
